column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Made a reservation (a must) and when we arrived they were very gracious and gave us a better table (upstairs instead of down). Their steaks are amazing and I had lamb this time
column2: which was perfection. They have a small selection of salads but that isn't why one should go there. It's all about the meat
column3: baby! Love the wine list and cocktails as well. This place is perfect for a date night or a small birthday dinner with your closest friends.
